// Advertisements 2.1
// by Tsunami
//
// Types
// -----
// center: Center message
// chat: Chat message
// hint: Hint message
// menu: Menu message
// top: Top message
//
// Flags (optional)
// -----
// Accepts flags of admins that will not see the advertisement.
// When omitted everyone will see the advertisement.
// When left empty only admins will see the advertisement.

"Advertisements"
{
   "1"
    {
        "chat"          "{lightblue}>>>AltTAB costs money to run. {green}You can help! {lightblue}Check out our donations page at {green}https://ko-fi.com/alttab_tf2c"
    }
   "2"
    {
        "chat"          "{tomato}>>>Votekick is disabled on these servers.{lightblue} You can use {tomato}/report {lightblue} to alert our staff to any issues"
    }
   "3"
    {
        "chat"          "{lightblue}>>>Want to get notified when this server is looking for players? Join the AltTAB discord at {green}https://discord.gg/RRBGbPSvy7"
}
